note.p: Farmer. Of Eynsford, Kent, until at least 1842. At Farningham, Kent, 1851. Of Orange Court, Down, 1861.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1607/738/14), 1861 (RG9/462/76/14)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 2 October 2018)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1866.
